title: Step 74

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .sleeve CSS rule should not have an opacity property and value.

description:
Another way to set the opacity for an element is with the alpha channel. Similar to the opacity property, the alpha channel controls how transparent or opaque a color is.

You've already set sleeve's opacity with a named color and the opacity property, but you can add an alpha channel to the other CSS color properties.

Inside the .sleeve rule, remove the opacity property and value.
